properties.name: carbohydrateContent
properties.description: The number of grams of carbohydrates.

properties.name: cholesterolContent
properties.description: The number of milligrams of cholesterol.

properties.name: fatContent
properties.description: The number of grams of fat.

properties.name: fiberContent
properties.description: The number of grams of fiber.

properties.name: proteinContent
properties.description: The number of grams of protein.

properties.name: saturatedFatContent
properties.description: The number of grams of saturated fat.

properties.name: servingSize
properties.description: The serving size, in terms of the number of volume or mass.

properties.name: sodiumContent
properties.description: The number of milligrams of sodium.

properties.name: sugarContent
properties.description: The number of grams of sugar.

properties.name: transFatContent
properties.description: The number of grams of trans fat.

properties.name: unsaturatedFatContent
properties.description: The number of grams of unsaturated fat.

Thing.name: additionalType
Thing.description: An additional type for the item, typically used for adding more specific types from external vocabularies in microdata syntax. This is a relationship between something and a class that the thing is in. In RDFa syntax, it is better to use the native RDFa syntax - the 'typeof' attribute - for multiple types. Schema.org tools may have only weaker understanding of extra types, in particular those defined externally.

Thing.name: description
Thing.description: A short description of the item.

Thing.name: image
Thing.description: An image of the item. This can be a URL or a fully described ImageObject.

Thing.name: potentialAction
Thing.description: Indicates a potential Action, which describes an idealized action in which this thing would play an 'object' role.

Thing.name: sameAs
Thing.description: URL of a reference Web page that unambiguously indicates the item's identity. E.g. the URL of the item's Wikipedia page, Freebase page, or official website.
